uiEntry.title: root
uiEntry.script:
local this = UIComponent(Address)
function ShowMenu(name) for i = 0, this:ChildCount() - 1 do local child = UIComponent(this:Find(i)) child:SetVisible(child:Id() == name) end end

uiEntry.title: heading
uiEntry.tooltip: On this screen you can select your nation, battle and campaign difficulty and see victory conditions vital to winning the campaign.||Move your cursor over the different areas below to see more information.

uiEntry.title: button_back
uiEntry.tooltip: Previous screen

uiEntry.title: button_forward
uiEntry.script:
function OnSelect() local this = UIComponent(Address) local panel = UIComponent(this:Parent("grand_campaign"))
panel:LuaCall("StartCampaign") end

uiEntry.title: cartouche
uiEntry.tooltip: Your selected nation and the start year of the grand campaign.||To select another nation select one of the other flags above.

uiEntry.title: faction_leader
uiEntry.tooltip: This is the leader for this nation.

uiEntry.title: ReviewPanelAgentHitbox
year_txt
uiEntry.tooltip: Your selected nation and the start year of the grand campaign.||To select another nation select one of the other flags above.

uiEntry.title: row_example
uiEntry.script:
local parent = UIComponent(UIComponent(Address):Parent(3))
function OnSelect() parent:LuaCall("SelectOption", Address) end

uiEntry.title: heading_tx
uiEntry.tooltip: Here you can see the overall difficulty of your nation and set the individual difficulty settings for your campaign and battle maps.

uiEntry.title: cmp_diff_tx
uiEntry.tooltip: You can increase or decrease campaign difficulty with the slider.

uiEntry.title: btl_diff_tx
uiEntry.tooltip: You can increase or decrease battle difficulty with the slider.

uiEntry.title: dropin_tx
uiEntry.tooltip: Click here to enable drop-in battles.||This will give players the option to replace the AI in battle and fight real opponents instead.

uiEntry.title: button_options
uiEntry.tooltip: Change settings such as advisor help and battle time limit here.||You can change these settings at any time during the campaign on the Game Settings panel.

uiEntry.title: heading_tx
uiEntry.tooltip: This panel gives you a historic context for your campaign and offers hints and tips on how to proceed.||Each nation will have its own advice to offer according to its tactical location and its potential for expansion.

uiEntry.title: handle
advisor
uiEntry.tooltip: Check this box to receive gameplay tips from the in-game advisor.||The advisor will appear in the top left-hand of the screen.||If this is your first time playing the game, it is probably a good idea to have the advisor on.

uiEntry.title: advisor_tx
uiEntry.tooltip: Check this box to receive gameplay tips from the in-game advisor.||The advisor will appear in the top left-hand of the screen.||If this is your first time playing the game, it is probably a good idea to have the advisor on.

uiEntry.title: CPU_moves
uiEntry.tooltip: If this is checked, visible CPU player's moves will be shown during the end turn phase.||This can help to keep a track on some of the CPU's locations and movements, but the end turn phase will also take longer.

uiEntry.title: cpu_moves_tx
uiEntry.tooltip: If this is checked, visible CPU player's moves will be shown during the end turn phase.||This can help to keep a track on some of the CPU's locations and movements, but the end turn phase will also take longer.

uiEntry.title: city_management
uiEntry.tooltip: If this box is checked, taxes and construction will be automatically managed.||This will free you up to concentrate on other areas of the game.

uiEntry.title: city_management_tx
uiEntry.tooltip: If this box is checked, taxes and construction will be automatically managed.||This will free you up to concentrate on other areas of the game.

uiEntry.title: box
uiEntry.tooltip: Battle time limit options

uiEntry.title: button_ok
uiEntry.tooltip: Accept
uiEntry.script:
function OnSelect() local this = UIComponent(Address) local panel = UIComponent(this:Parent("main_panel"))
panel:LuaCall("AcceptAdvancedOptions") end

uiEntry.title: button_cancel
uiEntry.tooltip: Cancel
uiEntry.script:
function OnSelect() local this = UIComponent(Address) local panel = UIComponent(this:Parent("main_panel"))
panel:LuaCall("CancelAdvancedOptions") end

uiEntry.title: battle_time_limit
uiEntry.tooltip: Check this box to impose a time limit on battles played on the battlemap.||Once checked, the time limit choices will appear below.

uiEntry.title: time_limit_tx
uiEntry.tooltip: Check this box to impose a time limit on battles played on the battlemap.||Once checked, the time limit choices will appear below.

uiEntry.title: victory_conditions
uiEntry.tooltip: To win the grand campaign you must complete these objectives within the time limit given.||As you play through the grand campaign you will be given tips on how to achieve these conditions.

uiEntry.title: Text
uiEntry.script: function InitState(state) Component.Call("Resize", Component.Call("Width"), state.Text.DisplayHeight) Component.Call("Parent.LuaCall", "SetTextExtents", state.Text.DisplayWidth, state.Text.DisplayHeight) end

uiEntry.title: row_example
uiEntry.script:
local parent = UIComponent(UIComponent(Address):Parent(3))
function OnSelect() parent:LuaCall("SelectOption", Address) end

uiEntry.title: faction_button
uiEntry.script:
local this = UIComponent(Address) local parent = UIComponent(this:Parent("faction_selection"))
function OnSelect() parent:LuaCall("FactionSelected", this:Id()) end
